welcome_message_body: Welcome to Silopi, Turkey! Embrace the charm of this historical city nestled between the Tigris and Habur rivers, known for its rich cultural heritage and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Silopi has to offer.

restaurants.name: PizzaLive
restaurants.description: PizzaLive is a pizzeria located in Silopi.
restaurants.address: Sanat Sokağı Karşısı Ziraat Bankası Yanı No:9 (Silopi), Silopi

restaurants.description: Akdeniz Tantuni Cafe is a burrito restaurant located in Silopi İlçesi.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sirnak Serafettin Elci Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
